release.action: Now supports content Math through stylesheet!
Remove Alpha channel from BMP and JPG output.
Now uses all available fonts as symbol catch fonts, to support new types of fonts
Improved character support from high plane
Moved 1.6-dependent code to jeuclid-core16
Repaired Batik SVG support, cleaned up triple use of batik
better font caching; full support for STIX, use deja vu and stix in full distribution
Support for autoloading fonts in jar files
Added french translation to MathViewer
Removed old command line parser
Finished converting Mml2xxx to use commons-cli and new LayoutContext.Parameter. Also implemented copy to clipboard in MathViewer.
re-enabled anti-alias rendering hints.
Added ParametersDialog to MathViewer so that all available parameters can be viewed/changed. The dialog auto-generates UI for all the parameters
LayoutContext Parameters now encapsulate information suitable for auto-generating cmd line options and UI input dialogs
Added MFRAC_KEEP_SCRIPTLEVEL LayoutContext.Parameter
Added paste-mathml-from-clipboard capability to MathViewer
LayoutContext.Parameter.ColorTypeWrapper now uses existing AttributesHelper APIs; FreeHEPConverter works (again) but needs further ckeanup
DOMBuilder now uses local names for attributes.
osxappbundler now has a released version.
Additional refactoring of LayoutContext.Parameter; also provided toString(Object) method to comlement fromString(String)
LayoutContext.Parameter: refactored valid() and added fromString(String)
Added Frown (U+2322) to the list of horizontal delimiters
Removed author tags
Moved MathViewer into own package
Support Cambria Fonts (Win Vista + Office 2007)
Completed Redesign
Yet another Layout Redesign
Removed potential memory leak from MathComponentUI
updated fop-plugin for 0.94
removed EXPERIMENTAL from all docs
Started to work on LayoutTree
JMathComponent supports Node instead of Document; default document set to simple node for performance reasons.
MathSize is now handled through context
Added conversion do DOM as suggested by Victor Mote
Replaced isChildBlock with LayoutContext
Removed MathBase from all Elements
LayoutContext is now in RootElement
Split LayoutContext into LayoutContext and MutableLayoutContext
Replaced ParameterKey by LayoutContext
Removed OutFileType from RenderingKey
Made DOM Builder a singleton
Deprecated old converter API
foprep: No uses percentage alignment-adjust instead of absolute baseline-shift
CharConverter: Split into Early (parsing) and late conversion; Used this to keep information on mapped special chars, such as InvisibleTimes Created a safe "createTextLayout" function;
Parser: support more Source Types through transformer;
foprep now has a Source / Result interface; rewrote foprep Main to use it;
Created new Parser API based on JAXP sources;
xxe plugin: converter now checks target file type; xxe plugin: Implemented Vector scaling;
checkstyle ImportOrder now matches Eclipse Organize imports
reworked Text handling in DOM model.
created fo preprocess application
MathMLParserSupport: turned on namespaces, xinclude
FontFactory: cosmetic fixes;
Released 2.9.7;
added new module: plugin for XXE
createad our own m2 repository; enabled fop-plugin to build by default
added ODF Reader to fop-plugin (requires fix of bug in fop)
fixed a scaling bug in Mo
Anti-Alias fix for sun jdk 1.5
MathMLParserSupport: Added functionality to parse InputStreams.
Rewrote xml-fop to draw directly onto G2D adapter.
SwingComponent: support Border property.
implemented all of FreeHEP supported filetypes
refactored convert methods to return rendering's dimensions; original Converter still returns boolean.
Modified Converter (the new one) and MathMLParserSupport to take Node instead of Document consistent with DOMBuilder's capabilities.
refactored new Converter, ConverterPlugin and its concrete implementations to accept OutputStream instead of File
finished rework of mmultiscripts
minor refactoring in MathViewer
more cleanups on jeuclid-fop
several minor changes to fix compliance with spec in Mi, Mfenced, space handling, AbstractSubSuper.
minor refactoring of FontFactory
better implementation for width of text elements.
implemented non-overlap for sub/super elements.
introduced FontFactory and changed MathVariant & Mglyph to use it
repaired property setting in swing component.
fixed maction to only display selected content, as per spec.
re-merged most modules, added "minimal" module
added first draft of SWF output through FreeHEP
Re-wrote converter API again, inspired by Eric's changes.
Added method to re-serialize the MathML DOM tree to a String
Generated W3C DOM model from Spec; This added documentation and exposed a few inconsistencies in the DOM model as available from the webpage.
DocumentElement not implements DisplayableNode
complete rewrite of menclose; update of root to scale bar;
StringUtil: cleaned up; better mapping for high plane chars; added mapping for most high-plane chars;
JEuclidElementFactory: is now Map-based;
added an implementation for MathMLNodeList; more cleanups for mmultiscripts;
refactored Script element support; added new class AbstractScriptElement; started cleanup of Mmultiscripts
Added support for the "none" element
created class ScriptSupport; Moved Sub/Super baselineshift calculation there, reworked calucation to center sub/supers.
Defense: Checkstyle fixes; added package.html for AWT, Swing Component;
renamed modules for compatiblity with continuum
imported fop classes from fop, modified to compile with current jeuclid;
started work on fop-module
PartialTextImpl: JavaDoc fixes
converter: checkstyle and documentation fixes.

refactored converter, static calls should use net.sourceforge.jeuclid.ConverterTool instead of net.sourceforge.jeuclid.Converter. The converter detects if batik is in the classpath, if yes then it instantiates the SVG able converter otherwise fails back to the default one.
implemented CommandLineParser (moved out of mml2xxx) MathViewer now accepts command line arguments
AWT componet test is now a proper test;
added dashboard report
repaired website; contains ugly hack in menus;
repeared checkstyle; added proguard configuration (disabled because it saves only approx. 0.5%)
Split up the main JEuclid into many smaller components, this is work in progress;
Proper support for serialization of DOM Tree (needed for swing component's content property);
Improved documentation on source webpage
DOMBuilder now supports building from Document, DocumentFragment, Element
Improved get/setFont compatiblity in Swing Component
added readme for build.xml
Added mapping UnderBar to OverBar;
pom: updated dependency for appassembler, updated assemble descriptors;
MathBase now returns a size >= 1x1
Mo: Changed list of horizontal delimiters; added fix for potential division by zero;
removed extra spacing around operators with pre / postscripts; created constant for "0";
created constants for "true" and "false"
started to work on desriptor for source distribution, which also supplies ant build.xml file
Changed default rendering params;
Updated webstart config settings;
Mml2xxx now prints more information in case of failure;
Released 2.9.6; updated website; re-rendered testsuite
DOMAttributeMap, Mtable, Mstyle, SAXAttributeMap, AbstractJEuclidElement: checkstyle fixes;
refactored mtext into abstract classes; implemented mglyph element; All MathML 2.0 presentation tokens are now supported!
implemented merror; implemented (empty) support for maction;
version tag is now forced for classes; Major refactoring; almost everything has moved and been renamed; THIS BREAKS the API!

reduced value for non-accent under/over elements; MathRoot: Reduced size for index; MathOperator: fixed logic for movable limits; MathStyle: implemented displaystyle property; Added logic to properly center munver/mover elements; Added support for misspelled "movablelimits"
MathText: better support for text containing spaces at the end; MathText: better support for characters which extend to the left; MathOperator: now uses the same width-calculation as MathText;
Mathviewer: added toggle for debug; JMathComponent: fix handling of debug flag;
Internal coordinates are now all float. THIS BREAKS THE API!
DOMMathBuilder: Checkstyle fixes;
AbstractMathElement: changed whitespace handling, now only trivial spaces are collapsed
DOMMathBuilder: small performance tuning;
MathUnder/Over: Common functionality merged; cleaned up;
MathUnder/Over: started to merge some common functionality;
AttributesHelper: checkstyle fixes;
MathOperator: restored proper support for horizontal stretching; AttributesHelper: Checkstyle fixes;
added DejaVu Sans to list of symbolcatchfonts. (needed for char 20D7); changed mapping for old openoffice vector char; added notes for OpenOffice; updated FAQ
pom.xml: removed dependency on particular surefire version; enabled DOM test for mpadded;
Basic implementation of mpadded;
MathMultiScripts: Checkstyle fixes; modified checkstyle configuration (disabled todo items);
updated roadmap
Released 2.9.5; updated website;
mtable: now supports w3c dom model; this was the last one!
munderover, munder, mover: moved to DOM interface, prepared for cleanup; enabled all DOM test cases;
MathTable: preparations for move to w3c dom;
removed eventElementComplete (obsolete through changeHook());
removed several PMD errors
mtable: implemented rowlines and columnlines attributes
Rewrote change management (still needs more work); added pmd plugin to report
Completely rewrote MathOperator; WARNING: Some things may now behave differently;
Converter: fixed convert(File,File,String)
yet another font-list change;
added more symbol catch fonts;
sub/super: shift values modified again (still not happy with it, but it looks better now;
MathText: Better verson of getAscent / getDescent;
AttributesHelper: Removed unnecessary dependency on java 1.6
various random checkstyle fixes;
SAXMathBuilder: DocumentElement was not not set to MathBase.
pom.xml: updated to newer version of assembly-plugin (proper file permissions)
Fixed height calculation and submiddleshift in msub and msubsup
usage.apt: added description for OpenSymbol
Better default list of "symbol catch fonts"
JMathComponent: better documentation; ParameterKey: better documentation
minor JavaDoc updates; added Lucida Grande to list of sans fonts; Website Font install updates;
StringUtil: Proper mappings for script and double-struck;
re-arranged default font lists again;
JMathComponent: default font is serif, documentation updated;
Yet another bug in text width. I hope it's fixed now.
Textbased layouts (mi, mtext) now use width instead of advance for width, to better support italic fonts

rewrote color parsing in AttributesHelper (mostly copied from fop, but I was the one who submitted the patch there in the first place :) ); made sure JMathComponent properly handles null color and colors with alpha value.
JMathComponentBeanInfo: Short description for fonts;
even more fonts into default lists
more fonts into default lists
JMathComponent: Bean access to font list parameters
Paramters: Extra parameters for font lists.
mml2xxx: output default values for parameters
MathOperator, MathElement: Now uses first char instead of 'A' for font-test;

Converter: changed convert funtion to take File,File,Map Mml2xxx: made more generic: Autodetect of target mimeType; support for all renderingparams; Re-rendered testsuite on white background, disabled all-names
MathTable: fixed height calculation due to rounding errors
usage.apt: instructions how to use in mvn-based projects
Background color is only painted when actually set or on root element
pom.xml: set explizit versions of appbundler and appassembler to make use of current bugfixes, such as directory bug in mml2xxx
StringUtil: Better support for other fonts.
JMathComponent: Override get/setForeground, get/setBackground to properly set rendering params. JMathComponentBeanInfo: Added properties background, foreground
added rendering params for foreground, background color
ColorParsing is moved to AttributesHelper, rewritten using hashmap, added addtl colors "transparent", ""
added getLayout function to MathText
added some more default fonts for monospaces, serif, and sans-serif, particularly support for DejaVu, Lucida, Bitstream Vera, Arial Unicode MS; DejaVu fonts are now the default (if available)
Slightly changed behaviour of renderingParams
MathMultiScripts: Started to implement MathMLMultiScriptsElement
MathSup: Fix in position of super
MathSup, MathSubSup: Now has better handling for size / position of super element.
Completely rewritten AttributesHelper for unitconversion.
updated FAQ for supported imageformats.
added file mode for executable files for osx and distribution
FileModes in packages where wrong due to http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MASSEMBLY-173
MathVariant: checkstyle fixes, added FontFamily enum
MathDocumentElement: removed createListOfChildren, merged into ElementListSupport
AbstractRootElement: getAscentHeight now delivers a more realistic height;
w3ctestsuite removed, as it is extracted onto the site
Rewrote / Externalized AboutDialog in MathViewer
MathText: replaced round(+0.5) with ceil; Checkstyle: removed indentation check (done by eclipse) AbtractMathElement: Checkstyle fixes; MathOperator: Checkstyle fixes
MathOperator/getWidth behaved differently in different situations
link to webstart app from website; added warning to webstart page
Configuration and template for maven-webstart-plugin; Please note: requires a current SVN checkout of this plugin, but fortunately only if actually used; Deployed MathViewer as JNLP
LICENSE renamed to LICENSE.txt for repository bundle compatibility
renamed OS X app to "JEuclid MathViewer"; website / documentation updates
added assemble descriptor for OSX package, created new OSX package (ending in -osx)
Released 2.9.4
MathViewer now has Anti-Alias menu entry
MathViewer now uses current rendering attributes for export
Better description for source on website; pom.xml updated for proper sf servers
MathSpace now implementes MathMLSpaceElement; MathString now implemente MathMLStringLitElement; Added AbstractRootElement; rewrote MathRoot and MathSqrt to implement AbstractRootElement;

AbstractMathElementWithSubSuper added; MathMultiScript: extends AbstractMathElementWithSubSuper; MathSub: extends AbstractMathElementWithSubSuper; MathSubSup: extends AbstractMathElementWithSubSuper; MathSup: extends AbstractMathElementWithSubSuper; Moved DY to AbstractMathElementWithSubSuper, renamed to DEFAULT_SCRIPTSHIFT; MathSub, MathSup, MathSubSup: Modified to use generic getMiddleShift functions; MathStyle: now implements MathMLStyleElement;
PartialTextImpl to DOM model
JMathComponent: added getContent(); WARNING: Does not work completely yet!
website updated: added logo, source page, fixed typos
MathViewer: error message if convert failed
MathViewer: export menu item; export code
Converter: rewrote getSuffixForMimeType; Converter: added getMimeTypeForSuffix; ConverterTest: added test for suffix/mimeType handling
MathViewer split up into MathViewer and MainFrame
JEuclid OS X logo updated.
Added new icons for JEuclid, activated the icons for BeanInfo;
OperatorDictionary: checkstyle fixes
jeuclid.mf is no longer needed
added testcase for svg conversion; pom.xml: added some provided dependencies, such as XML apis; pom.xml: dependency to commons-logging-api instead of commons-logging
maven checkstyle is too old, temporaily disabled trailing comment check
proper translation to MathViewer, support for $$ comments, added german translation to MathViewer
pom.xml: groupId set to net.sf.jeuclid
pom.xml: Use maven-changes-plugin instead of mojo changes plugin because its newer
MathViewer: Prepared for localization
MathTableData: refactored for move to MathMLTableCellElement (still incomplete)
MathTableRow: moved ATTR_ constants to MathTable
MathTableRow: started to refactor to support MathMLTableRowElement, not complete yet
AbstractMathElement: Alignment constants; MathFrac: use those
MathPhantom, MathPreScripts, MathRow, MathSpace, MathString: Checkstyle fixes.
AbstractMathElement: CheckStyle fixes, attrs made into constants

AbstractDOMImpl: implemented getAttributes, getLocalName, getNamespaceURI, getNodeValue, getNextSibling, getNodeType, getXmlVersion, getXmlStandalone, getXmlEncoding; XML Transformer can now produce output, however, text nodes are still missing
MathViewer: About window changed, disabled on OS X
distribution.xml: added LICENSE, NOTICE
pom.xml: Ensure appbundler can be found
added setMathElement function, rewrote Frac to use it; added testCase; implemented replaceChild;
pom.xml: configuration to create proper manifest in jar file
removed obsolete build.xml file
developers in pom.xml; jvmVersion for OS X bundle
AbstractMathElementWithChildren now implements MathMLPresentationContainer
MathViewer: cleanups.
DOMModelTest: Created tests for all interfaces.
MathComponentTest: formatting changes
JMathComponentBeanInfo: jeulid.png is in /
Checkstyle Config now works properly in Eclipse and Maven
support for assembly plugin, added to package phase
pom.xml: now calls appassembler, appbundler for package
Configuration, icon, and JavaApplicationStub for OS X build
refactored all externally used methods from AbstractMathElement into new Interface MathElement

JMathComponentBeanInfo, MathMLParserSupport, Checkstyle fixes; Exlpicitly disabled checkstyle for tests; moved all tests into test package; enabled checkstyle for eclipse (requires eclipse to be started from project dir, bugreport in progress)
JMathComponentBeanInfo
JMathComponent can now set content from given MathML String.
ODFSupport renamed to MathMLParserSupport; Moved methods for parsing from String there; refactored Tests to use that method
MathDocumentElement: checkstyle fixes; IllegalToken removed from Checkstyle errors
Moved project to Subversion
jeuclid-users mailing list
W3C Testsuite to site, snapshot of generated elements.
AbstractMathElement: eventInitSpecificAttributes renamed to setMathAttributes()
MatOperator: moved parameter calculation into eventElementComplete
AbstactMathElementWithDelegate: now overrides eventElementComplete instead of eventInitSpecificAttributes
ODFSupport does not throw ZIP errors anymore; Parser logs warning and errors instead of terminating
DOMModelTest: moved to test package; implemented tests for mathOperator
AbstractPartialNodeImpl: getLastChild implemented.
Larger and smaller font to MathViewer.
Anti-Alias moved to MathBase, made into parameter
Replaced all occurrences of Graphics with Graphics2D: This is what is actually used/needed anyways.
MathBase: removed deprecated constructor; made Debug a Parameter
refactored element creation from SAXMathBuilder into MathElementFactory.
More CheckStyle fixes: MathOperator, MathTable, MathViewer; MathViewer: Added accellerator for quit.

Checkstyle fixes: Converter, ODFSupport, StringUtil, DictionaryException, ElementListSupport, AbstractRowLikeElement, AbstractMathElementWithChildren, AbstractMathContainer, MathAlignGroup, MathDocumentElement, DOMBuilder, MathBase, Mml2xxx, MathComponent, MathMLConverter, MathSubSup, MathSup, MathLabeledTableRow
configured log4j for tests properly.
checkstyle settings to better match priorities (javadoc and license is now error)
developers on website
roadmap to website
pom.xml was missing a release information; usage.apt now has proper links to sf releases; index.apt updated
DOM Tree now contains a DocumentNode AND a Math node. MathRow is now an MathMLPresentationContainer.
AbstractMathElementWithChildren now uses ElementListSupport
Introduced ElementListSupport and moved functions from AbstractElementWithDelegates there
refactored AbstractMathElementWithChildren into AbstractRowLikeElement
batik dependency to 1.6-1
MathMLConverter ANT task to use Util.Converter
removed ant tasks dependent on old fop
Announced Logo Contest on webpage
Replaced images on website with ones generated on Mac (look better)
Split webpage into several pages
pom.xml: jeuclid mailing list is jeuclid-devel; added taglist plugin
refactored AbstractMathElementWithDelegate to AbstractMathElementWithDelegates, changed internal workings. MathFenced: reworked to work with new AbstractMathElementWithDelegates
MathBase: removed obsolete debug output
pom.xml: removed depencies on SNAPSHOT versions
version to 2.9.3-SNAPSHOT in pom.xml and changes.xml
MathMLDocumentElement
refactored PartialNodeImpl into AbstractPartialDocumentImpl, AbstractPartialElementImpl, AbstractPartialNodeImpl and ChangeTrackingElement to AbstractChangeTrackingElement
fixed link to issue management in pom.xml
refactored util.Converter class into util.Converter and app.Mml2xxx
fixed appassembler target in pom.xml
removed docs, libs, build.xml
removed unnecessary checkstyle tests: empty lines, org/*, StrictDuplicate
creating app-scripts in pom.xml
Developers in pom.xml
JEuclid menu to website
Screenshots on website are now ok.
added checkstyle to pom.xml
created changelog.xml
